document_data.name: ''Caustic Band''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Caustic band''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[ring]] that granted the wearer the offensive power of [[acid]].
document_data.Powers: ''Caustic band'' infused the wielder's weapons or fists with magical acid – this ''malefic excretion'' was released with each successful attack onto the targets. The ring's central big green [[gem]] released a faint sound of sizzling when it was adjusted on the wearer's finger.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, one such ring belonged to [[Derryth Bonecloak]], a [[dwarf|dwarvish]] [[potion]] maker who ran a shop in [[Baldur's Gate]] and collected [[fungi]] in the [[Underdark]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
